QuestData.Title: Echoes of Tortured Souls
QuestData.Description: We're severely undermanned to be risking a venture into the citadel, but opportunities like this are too rare to pass up.$B$BClear the way to the far side and secure the passage to the Pit of Saron. We will need to hold it to move our men further into the citadel.
QuestData.LogDescription: Kill Bronjahm and the Devourer of Souls to secure access to the Pit of Saron.
